abstracts.cdata!:
The Liao River Basin Project seeks to
            address environmental concerns regarding watewater and
            specified waste disposal in Shenyang, Yingkou, and Jinzhou,
            which will consist of urban wastewater subprojects, paper
            mill industrial wastewater management, and construction of a
            wastewater treatment plant at Xinglongtai, and the relevant
            urban interceptor system. This resettlement action plan
            looks at the reallocation and rehabilitation actions needed
            to ensure that project affected persons (PAPs) will benefit
            from the project, and their living conditions will improve,
            or at least be restored to prior standards. Affected
            productive resources of business and public property,
            infrastructure, and cultural property will be restored by
            the project. Compensations will take the form of land for
            land replacement; residential housing will be compensated at
            replacement costs, or with cash compensation; and crop
            losses will be compensated based on output per hectare
            values. Compensation will also be provided in the form of
            subsidies for moving expenses, income, and/or business
            losses due to resettlement. PAPs will be informed about
            resettlement policies, and procedures, which include
            grievance mechanisms to appeal at the concerned Department.
